strategy: Randomize between cooperating and defecting with a 60% chance of choosing the action that matches the column player's preferred option (e.g., if column player prefers to go to the cinema, play cinema with 60% probability; otherwise, go to the restaurant). This leverages the inherent asymmetry in preferences and exploits the column player's uncertainty to create a predictable pattern that induces higher average payoff when the row player's action aligns with the column player's revealed preference.
